name: 1v1.lol
desc: 1v1.lol is a third-person shooter and building game that lets you show off your building skills. The mission is to eliminate the opponents and become the last survivor.
2048 is a single-player sliding block puzzle game. The game's objective is to slide numbered tiles on a grid to combine them to create a tile with the number 2048.

name: Cookie Clicker
desc: Cookie Clicker is a game where you collect cookies by clicking on them. The more cookies you collect, the more money you get.

name: Eagler Craft
desc: Eaglercraft is an open-source Minecraft mod that adds more features to the game.

name: OvO
desc: OvO is a virtual reality game that lets you play with your friends in a virtual world.

name: Slope
desc: Slope is a 2D platformer game where you control a character and climb platforms.

name: Idle Breakout
desc: Idle Breakout is a game where you break blocks with your mouse.

name: Vex 8
desc: Vex 8 is a game where you control a robot and collect coins.

name: Time Shooter 3
desc: Time Shooter 3 is a game where you shoot enemies and collect coins.

name: Run 3
desc: Run 3 is a game where you run and collect coins. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Basket Random
desc: Basket Random is a game where you control a basket and collect coins. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Hole IO
desc: Hole IO is a game where you try to put as many objects into a hole as possible. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Paper IO
desc: Paper IO is a game where you control a paper and try to cover as much area as possible. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Basket Bros
desc: Basketball Bros is a game where you control a basketball player and try to score as many points as possible. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Subway Surfers
desc: Subway Surfers is a game where you control a player while running from the police and collect coins. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Territorial
desc: Terriorial is a game where you try to take control over as much territory as possible. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Temple Run
desc: Temple Run is a game where you are running from monkies and collecting coins. The game has multiple levels and challenges.

name: Bitlife
desc: Bitlife is a life simulation game where you are in control of a character's life.
